title: Economic Systems and Market Analysis

vocab.definition: Economic system based on private ownership and free markets
Economic system with collective ownership of production means
Economic principle determining prices through market forces
Economic system where decisions are made by individual buyers and sellers
Total value of goods and services produced in country

teachingNotes: Compare different economic systems and their outcomes. Use real examples to illustrate economic principles.

sample.question: What economic system is based on private ownership and free markets?

truefalse.question: Supply and demand determine prices through market forces.

multiplechoice.question: What measures total value of goods and services produced?

fillintheblank.question: An economic system with collective ownership is ________.

shortanswer.question: What are advantages and disadvantages of capitalism?
